short_description: Add albums or playlists to your site

notification.min: Please add at least one item!
notification.max: You reached the maximum number of items.

description: Add albums or playlists to your site
name: Audio Player

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the widget's background.
options.label: Background Color

options.help_text: Select the order in which the elements appear and which of them should be visible.
options.label: Player Structure

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the scroll.
options.label: Scroll Color

options.help_text: Set the position of the scroll bar.
options.label: Scroll Position

options.help_text: If true, when reaching the end of a song, the next one starts automatically. This feature is not available on mobile browsers.
options.label: Playlist Autoadvance

options.help_text: If true, when reaching the end, the playlist starts over again.
options.label: Playlist Loop

options.help_text: If true, the songs will play in a random order.
options.label: Shuffle

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the progress bar.
options.label: Background Color

options.help_text: Set the progress bar's height.
options.label: Height

options.help_text: Set visibility of the toggle button.
options.label: Display Toggle Button

options.help_text: Set the distance between the progress bar elements.
options.label: Elements Padding

options.help_text: Set the progress bar’s height.
options.label: Bar Height

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the played progress bar.
options.label: Played Bar Color

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the progress bar's buffer.
options.label: Buffered Bar Color

options.help_text: Set the scrub thickness.
options.label: Scrub Thickness

options.help_text: Set the scrub height.
options.label: Scrub Height

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the scrub.
options.label: Scrub Color

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the scrub,  on mouse hover.
options.label: Scrub Hover Color

options.help_text: Set the distance between the playlist and the left and right margins of the widget.
options.label: Playlist Sides Margin

options.help_text: Set the distance between the playlist and the top and bottom margins of the widget.
options.label: Playlist Height Margin

options.help_text: Select the height of the individual items in the playlist.
options.label: Item Height

options.help_text: Select the order in which the elements appear and which of them should be visible.
options.label: Item Elements Structure

options.help_text: Set the distance between the number, titles and button.
options.label: Elements Padding

options.help_text: Select the thickness for the separator line.
options.label: Separator Line Thickness

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the separator line.
options.label: Separator Line Color

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the item's background.
options.label: Item Background Color

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the item's hover background.
options.label: Hover Background Color

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the selected items background.
options.label: Selected Background Color

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the selected item.
options.label: Elements Selected Color
Title Font Style
options.help_text: Set the font style for the title text.
Select the color and transparency for the title.
options.label: Title Color

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the title on mouse hover.
options.label: Title Hover Color

options.help_text: Set the play / pause icon size.
options.label: Play Icon Size

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the button’s icon.
options.label: Play Icon Color

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the button’s icon, on mouse hover.
options.label: Play Hover Color

options.help_text: Set the font style for the timer text.
options.label: Number Font Style

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the item numbers.
options.label: Number Color

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the item numbers on mouse hover.
options.label: Number Hover Color

options.help_text: Set the font style for the timer text.
options.label: Timer Font Style

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the timer.
options.label: Timer Color

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the timer on mouse hover.
options.label: Timer Hover Color

options.help_text: Set the size of the visualiser.
options.label: Visualiser Height

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the widget's visualiser.
options.label: Background Color

options.help_text: Select the color and transparency for the visualiser.
options.label: Visualiser Color

options.help_text: Set the width of the dots.
options.label: Dot Width

options.help_text: Set the height of the dots.
options.label: Dot Height

options.help_text: Select the padding between the dots.
options.label: Dot Padding
